data.name: AboutExplanation_Text
data.value:
Text to speech: Not all languages are supported that are provided in the application settings. This option varies from device to device and the installed languages. It is possible that for some languages the translation to and from speech is done over the internet by the concerned services.
Google Translate was used for the translation of the text. This is not a guarantee that all translations are correct. The supporting languages are: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.
You can always contact me for any corrections.

data.name: CubeHelp_Text
data.value: Rotate the cube sides 'clockwise' and 'counter clockwise': If the command is given to turn the front 'clockwise' then this is in the direction the hands are turning. 'Counter clockwise' is turning in the other direction. For the other sides you always have to 'imagine' that you are directly in front of the side to be turned. So if it says turn the back 'clockwise' imagine you are on the other side of the cube and then turn the back 'clockwise'. Do not rotate the cube itself.

data.name: HexColorCodes_Text
data.value:
Hexadecimal color codes:
Characters 1-2: Red Characters 3-4: Green Characters 5-6: Blue

data.name: LicenseMit2_Text
data.value: The software is provided 'as is', without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement. In no event shall the author and/or publisher be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.

data.name: License_Text
data.value: This application may be used freely for non-commercial purposes. Use this program entirely at your own risk.

data.name: MessageColorCentralCube_Text
data.value: The color of the central square can only occur once.

data.name: MessageColorCornerCube_Text
data.value: The colors of a corner cube must be different.

data.name: MessageColorEdgeCube_Text
data.value: The colors of an edge cube must be different.

data.name: MessageCubeIsSolved_Text
data.value: Congratulations, the cube has been solved.

data.name: MessageNineSameColor_Text
data.value: Of each available color, there must be nine of the same color!

data.name: PrivacyPolicy_Text
data.value: No personal and other data is stored or passed on to myself and others.

data.name: SettingsSaved_Text
data.value: Some changed settings must be saved in order to apply them. After saving, the application is restarted and the cube is reset.

data.name: TextContainsChar_Text
data.value:
The text contains one or more characters that are not allowed.
Not allowed:

data.name: TextToSpeechError_Text
data.value: Text to speech is not supported on this device.

data.name: ToolTipSetColors_Text
data.value: Toggle button: Drag the colors onto the cube

data.name: TurnBackSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the back side half a turn.

data.name: TurnBackSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the back side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnBackSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the back side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).

data.name: TurnBottomSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the bottom side half a turn.

data.name: TurnBottomSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the bottom side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnBottomSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the bottom side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).

data.name: TurnCubeFrontSideToBottomSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the front goes to the bottom side.

data.name: TurnCubeFrontSideToLeftSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the front goes to the left side.

data.name: TurnCubeFrontSideToRightSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the front goes to the right side.

data.name: TurnCubeFrontSideToTopSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the front goes to the top side.

data.name: TurnCubeTopSideToLeftSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the top goes to the left side.

data.name: TurnCubeTopSideToRightSide_Text
data.value: Turn the entire cube so that the top goes to the right side.

data.name: TurnFrontMiddleToRightSide_Text
data.value: Turn the front-middle layer a quarter turn to the right side (-).

data.name: TurnFrontMiddleToTopSide_Text
data.value: Turn the front-middle layer a quarter turn to the top side (+).

data.name: TurnFrontSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the front side half a turn.

data.name: TurnFrontSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the front side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnFrontSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the front side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).

data.name: TurnLeftSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the left side half a turn.

data.name: TurnLeftSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the left side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnLeftSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the left side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).

data.name: TurnRightMiddleToFrontSide_Text
data.value: Turn the right-middle layer a quarter turn to the front side (+).

data.name: TurnRightMiddleToTopSide_Text
data.value: Turn the right-middle layer a quarter turn to the top side (-).

data.name: TurnRightSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the right side half a turn.

data.name: TurnRightSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the right side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnRightSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the right side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).

data.name: TurnTopMiddleToFrontSide_Text
data.value: Turn the top-middle layer a quarter turn to the front side (-).

data.name: TurnTopMiddleToRightSide_Text
data.value: Turn the top-middle layer a quarter turn to the right side (+).

data.name: TurnTopSideHalfTurn_Text
data.value: Turn the top side half a turn.

data.name: TurnTopSideToLeft_Text
data.value: Turn the top side a quarter turn 'counter clockwise' (-).

data.name: TurnTopSideToRight_Text
data.value: Turn the top side a quarter turn 'clockwise' (+).
